重要性；本质；真髓；根本性

bilingual.source: The two proposals are essentially the same.
bilingual.target: 这两个提案本质上是相同的。

bilingual.source: The command executed was essentially a noop.
bilingual.target: 执行的命令本质上是一个无操作。

bilingual.source: The book is essentially about human relationships.
bilingual.target: 这本书本质上是关于人际关系的。

bilingual.source: Essentially, the project aims to improve community health.
bilingual.target: 本质上，这个项目旨在改善社区健康。

bilingual.source: Essentially, he is a kind person despite his tough exterior.
bilingual.target: 本质上，尽管他外表坚强，但他是一个善良的人。

bilingual.source: Essentially, the new policy will benefit small businesses the most.
bilingual.target: 本质上，新政策将最有利于小企业。

bilingual.source: The book is essentially a paean to the beauty of nature.
bilingual.target: 这本书本质上是一首赞歌，赞美大自然的美丽。

bilingual.source: Thinking is essentially a process of making connections in the brain.
bilingual.target: 思考本质上是一个在大脑中建立联系的过程。

bilingual.source: We are learning not only all this information, but essentially how to learn again.
bilingual.target: 我们不仅在学习所有这些信息，而且在本质上学习如何再次学习。

bilingual.source: Essentially, we have this tendency to keep stretching out the decision-making process.
bilingual.target: 本质上，我们倾向于延长决策过程。

list.abstract: essentially，英语单词，可以用作副词，译为“本质上、根本上”。

yingyinNormal.en: Essentially. There's a tremendous amount of unused space in copper power lines.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本质上是的，铜质输电线路中存在庞大的未用空间。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. Cybernetics is robot stuff, right? Correct. So you want to turn yourself into some sort of robot? Essentially, yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，人造大脑是机器人之类的吧？没错。这么说你想把自己变成某种机器人？本质上是这样。

yingyinNormal.en: So there's my version of beef in oyster sauce, essentially, three stir-frys in one dish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是我做的蚝油牛肉，其实就是三菜合一。

yingyinNormal.en: And frankly, blood pudding is essentially the same thing. I don't know why he's serving both.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说实在的，黑香肠差不多也是一样的，我不知道他为啥整这俩菜。

yingyinNormal.en: We're essentially turning on an apparatus that's already in place. We'll enable audio capabilities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只是启动了一台早已就位的设备。我们会打开音频接收。

yingyinNormal.en: Well essentially, he won the lottery. Backwards or something. And in another world, I'd look like him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以理解为，他中奖了。坏事落到他的头上了。换个角度来说，我可能也会中。

yingyinNormal.en: We smuggle Slurpies, which are essentially Icees, in under our coats, after having a pleasant meal either here, here or here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以偷偷把Slurpees[7-11出的冷饮]带进去，就当刨冰了，藏大衣底下就行了，这样我们就可以从容地先在这里，这里，或者这里吃饭了。

yingyinNormal.en: And in fact, the typewriter was essentially deleted by this thing. And then more general versions of word processors came about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上，打字机完全被这个取代了。然后是更多代文字处理器面世。

yingyinNormal.en: No. It upsets Sheldon when she willy nilly takes it from the containers without regard for its equitable distribution. This is essentially why you have famine in India.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，应该是她从碗里随便拿起食物而不顾还要平均分配的问题时，让谢尔顿很郁闷。这就是印度有饥荒的根本原因。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. That's ambiguous. Is it five minutes apart starting at the top of the hour, or five minutes apart starting with the first contraction, so essentially, like, 65 minutes?
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉。这说得有点不清楚。这间隔五分钟是包含第一次的这一个小时，还是第一次5分钟间隔阵痛后一小时，所以基本上就是维持65分钟后。

yingyinNormal.en: A successful life essentially consists of doing these five steps over and over again. This is your personal evolution, and you see this process everywhere. It's just a law of nature.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个成功的生活一般就是这五步不断的重复。这是你的个人发展，你在各处都能看到这些步骤。这是自然法则。

yingyinNormal.en: So the theory is that he's having some immunological reaction to what's going on to the food essentially, right, and that's a natural reaction, which causes some programmed cell death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以根源就是他对食物有种免疫反应，这是种自然反应，它会导致程序性细胞死亡。

yingyinNormal.en: That is essentially the choice we all face. For me, the choice was clear, but that doesn't mean the path forward was without challenges. I still needed to face two big barriers that we all must face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是我们都要面临的选择。对我来说选择很明确，但不意味着前方的路就一帆风顺。我还是要面对我们都要面对的两大障碍。

yingyinNormal.en: The correct answer is when covered by a film of liquid sufficient to reduce the coefficient of static friction between the tire and the road to essentially zero, but not so deep as to introduce a new source of friction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正确的答案是"当[路面]被覆盖上一层液体足以把轮胎和道路之间的静态摩擦系数减少到理论上的零值又不产生新的摩擦源"。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's say she's falling from a 32 story building, about 300 feet, and you are 6 feet tall, maybe 10 feet on your tippy-toes, with your arms above your head holding a door, in hopes of distributing the pressure across a larger surface area, but all you're doing is essentially moving the ground up by 10 feet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如说她正在从32层楼上落下，差不多300英尺，而你有6英尺高，可能踮起脚尖有10英尺高，你双臂将一扇门举过头顶，期望能够将压力分散作用于一个更大的表面积上，但实际上你所做的只是把着陆点抬高了10英尺。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 该学区允许一些学生因复杂的家庭生活而不做家庭作业。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 必不可少的；绝对必要的；非常重要的；自发的；原发的；特发的；基本的；本质的；精华的；精髓的

word_family.mean: n. 本质；实质；要素；香精；香料

sense_info_list.en: in essence; at bottom or by one's very nature

examination_example.sentence: Social media screening is <highlight>essentially</highlight> scrutinising a job candidate's private life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社交媒体筛选实质上是在审查求职者的私人生活。

examination_example.sentence: European countries are <highlight>essentially</highlight> climate "free-riders"; incurring few of the costs such as climate change's impact on food and water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些欧洲国家的发展其实在本质搭上了气候的“顺风车”; 在食物和水源方面遭受气候变化的影响较少。

sense_info_list.en: more or less; used for saying that something is mostly true, but not completely true

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 必不可少的；绝对必要的；非常重要的；自发的；原发的；特发的；基本的；本质的；精华的；精髓的

word_family.mean: n. 本质；实质；要素；香精；香料

sense_info_list.en: in essence; at bottom or by one's very nature

examination_example.sentence: While they could once buy second-hand textbooks, or share copies with friends, the digital systems are <highlight>essentially</highlight> impossible to avoid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管他们曾经可以购买二手教科书，或与朋友共享副本，但数字系统基本上是无法避免的。

examination_example.sentence: We are learning not only all this information, but <highlight>essentially</highlight> how to learn again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不仅在学习所有这些信息，而且在本质上学习如何再次学习。

examination_example.sentence: Companies are tapping into these desires directly through what has come to be known as "gamification": <highlight>essentially</highlight>, turning work into a game.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司正在通过被称为“游戏化”的方式直接挖掘这些欲望：本质上，将工作变成游戏。

sense_info_list.en: more or less; used for saying that something is mostly true, but not completely true

examination_example.sentence: This is <highlight>essentially</highlight> how Jessica Hagy starts her day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这基本上是杰西卡·哈吉开始她的一天的方式。

examination_example.sentence: In the pediatricians' view, <highlight>essentially</highlight> every life skill that's valued in adults can be built up with play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在儿科医生看来，基本上每一项成人所重视的生活技能都可以通过玩耍来培养。
